title: Weird Bird Beaks
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 912 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 850L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and N		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and N

description: Have you ever wondered why some birds have such weird beaks? Have you wondered how they can eat or fly with such oddly shaped beaks? Weird Bird Beaks provides insight as to why some birds have the weird beaks they do. Photographs support the text. Book and lesson also available at Levels H and N.
highFrequencyWords: air pockets, dousing, elaborate, extinct, regurgitate, rirual, scarce, shellfish, wattles
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Adjectives                : Identify adjectives and the nouns they describe
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
